item.title: Play Classic Dave game in windows 7 32 bit using DOSBOX
item.description: Remember the Classic Dave game you might have played more than 10 years ago. That was the first game I played on PC. I liked it a lot. But it’s not possible to play Dave directly on Windows 7 32 bit.
